response.answer_text: djravi" Biography (Dj Ravi (Dj Ravi)) (dj ravi - Google Search (dj ravi - Google Search)) Ravi Yadav better known as DJ RAVI, is an Indian disc jockey, video jockey and producer DJ RAVI was born in Soraon , Allahabad (Prayagraj) Uttar Pradesh ,Dj Ravi is a DJs' no 1 remixer from Bhojpuri industry.
